org.opensaml.xml.security

Interface Criteria

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EvaluableCredentialCriteria, EvaluableCriteria<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityIDCriteria, EvaluableEntityIDCredentialCriteria, EvaluableKeyAlgorithmCredentialCriteria, EvaluableKeyLengthCredentialCriteria, EvaluableKeyNameCredentialCriteria, EvaluablePublicKeyCredentialCriteria, EvaluableUsageCredentialCriteria, EvaluableX509CertSelectorCredentialCriteria, EvaluableX509DigestCredentialCriteria, EvaluableX509IssuerSerialCredentialCriteria, EvaluableX509SubjectKeyIdentifierCredentialCriteria, EvaluableX509SubjectNameCredentialCriteria, KeyAlgorithmCriteria, KeyInfoCriteria, KeyLengthCriteria, KeyNameCriteria, PeerEntityIDCriteria, PublicKeyCriteria, UsageCriteria, X509DigestCriteria, X509IssuerSerialCriteria, X509SubjectKeyIdentifierCriteria, X509SubjectNameCriteria

    public interface Criteria
    A generic marker interface for representing criteria used in resolution or evaluation operations.
